Text:
Very interesting stuff. Kinda trippy that this is the song of a distant planet. It's very reminiscent of good ambient music, night even be good for meditation.

Great uploads! Keep it up :D

Thanks, I put these on my Cowon Curve and use them to relax where ever I am. Like said before, very trippy, nice. I like the idea of sitting around anywhere and having the ability to play the sounds of space.  Last night I was outside by the pool, with Saturn in view, as I listened to her rings.  Thanks again, great stuff!
